name: AzureDms
help: Manage Azure Data Migration Service (DMS) instances.

properties.name: Location
properties.help: Location. You can configure the default location using `az configure --defaults location=&lt;location&gt;`.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: The Service name to check.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: The name of the Service.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: Location
properties.help: Location. You can configure the default location using `az configure --defaults location=&lt;location&gt;`.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: The name of the Service.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: SkuName
properties.help: The name of the CPU SKU on which the service's Virtual Machine will run. Check the name and the availability of SKUs in your area with "az dms list-skus".

properties.name: Subnet
properties.help: The Resource ID of the VNet's Subnet you will use to connect the source and target DBs. Use "az network vnet subnet show -h" for help to get your subnet's ID.

properties.name: NoWait
properties.help: Do not wait for the long-running operation to finish.

properties.name: Tags
properties.help: A space-delimited list of tags in "tag1[=value1]" format.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: The name of the Service.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: DeleteRunningTasks
properties.help: Cancel any running tasks before deleting the service.

properties.name: NoWait
properties.help: Do not wait for the long-running operation to finish.

properties.name: Yes
properties.help: Do not prompt for confirmation.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: The name of the Service.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: NoWait

properties.name: Name
properties.help: The name of the Service.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: Created
properties.help: Wait until created with 'provisioningState' at 'Succeeded'.

properties.name: Custom
properties.help: Wait until the condition satisfies a custom JMESPath query. E.g. provisioningState!='InProgress', instanceView.statuses[?code=='PowerState/running'].

properties.name: Deleted
properties.help: Wait until deleted.

properties.name: Exists
properties.help: Wait until the resource exists.

properties.name: Interval
properties.help: Polling interval in seconds.

properties.name: Timeout
properties.help: Maximum wait in seconds.

properties.name: Updated
properties.help: Wait until updated with provisioningState at 'Succeeded'.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: The Project name to check.

properties.name: ResourceGroup

properties.name: ServiceName

properties.help: Location. You can configure the default location using `az configure --defaults location=&lt;location&gt;`.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: ServiceName
properties.help: The name of the Service.

properties.name: SourcePlatform
properties.help: The type of server for the source database. The supported types are: SQL.

properties.name: TargetPlatform
properties.help: The type of service for the target database. The supported types are: SQLDB.

properties.name: Tags
properties.help: A space-delimited list of tags in "tag1[=value1]" format.

properties.name: ServiceName
properties.help: The name of the Service.

properties.name: DatabaseOptionsJson
properties.help: Database and table information. This can be either a JSON-formatted string or the location to a file containing the JSON object. See example below for the format.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: The name of the Task.

properties.name: ProjectName
properties.help: The name of the Project.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: ServiceName
properties.help: The name of the Service.

properties.name: SourceConnectionJson
properties.help: The connection information to the source server. This can be either a JSON-formatted string or the location to a file containing the JSON object. See example below for the format.

properties.name: TargetConnectionJson
properties.help: The connection information to the target server. This can be either a JSON-formatted string or the location to a file containing the JSON object. See example below for the format.

properties.name: EnableDataIntegrityValidation
properties.help: Whether to perform a checksum based data integrity validation between source and target for the selected database and tables.

properties.name: EnableQueryAnalysisValidation
properties.help: Whether to perform a quick and intelligent query analysis by retrieving queries from the source database and executing them in the target. The result will have execution statistics for executions in source and target databases for the extracted queries.

properties.name: EnableSchemaValidation
properties.help: Whether to compare the schema information between source and target.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: The name of the Task.

properties.name: ProjectName
properties.help: The name of the Project.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: ServiceName
properties.help: The name of the Service.

properties.name: DeleteRunningTasks
properties.help: If the Task is currently running, cancel the Task before deleting the Project.

properties.name: Yes
properties.help: Do not prompt for confirmation.

properties.name: ProjectName
properties.help: The name of the Project.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: ServiceName
properties.help: The name of the Service.

properties.name: TaskType
properties.help: Filters the list by the type of task. For the list of possible types see "az dms check-status".

properties.name: Name
properties.help: The name of the Task.

properties.name: ProjectName
properties.help: The name of the Project.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: ServiceName
properties.help: The name of the Service.

properties.name: Expand
properties.help: Expand the response to provide more details. Use with "command" to see more details of the Task. Use with "output" to see the results of the Task's migration.

commonTaskProperties.name: Debug
commonTaskProperties.help: Increase logging verbosity to show all debug logs.

commonTaskProperties.name: Help
commonTaskProperties.help: Show this help message and exit.

commonTaskProperties.name: Query
commonTaskProperties.help: JMESPath query string. See http://jmespath.org/ for more information and examples.

commonTaskProperties.name: Verbose
commonTaskProperties.help: Increase logging verbosity. Use --debug for full debug logs.
